name: Comfort Suites Downtown South

reviews.text: Our room had ants in and near the coffee maker and in the bathroom, and the toilet barely flushed after 2-3 flushes. Also, there is no thermostat, just a loud below-window unit A/C with fan speed and temp. controls.
reviews.title: ants in room

reviews.text: However, the free breakfast was fine, and the pool was decent, not too cold like most hotel pools. There was also a nice hot tub.
reviews.title: Awesome Hotel Great Staff

likes.liked: — the front desk clerk named Austin

reviews.text: The manager/assistant mgr. was nice (and found some clothing that we had left behind in the lost & found when I called the next day), but the other front desk staff were rude and surly. Also, the location is not very convenient - you have to take a 10-minute tour of the highway frontage road to reach it if you are coming from the north.
reviews.title: No Hot Water,Run Down, Dirty and Loud

aka: Comfort Suites Downtown South Hotel Austin
